    • Highlights

    • Experience the diverse beauty of Kerala, from serene backwaters to lush hill stations.
    • Discover Cochin’s rich heritage, Munnar’s tea estates, and Thekkady’s wildlife sanctuary.
    • Enjoy a houseboat cruise in Alleppey, beach time in Kovalam, and historical sites in Trivandrum.
    • Visit Varkala’s famous cliffside views and pristine beaches for a memorable seaside experience.

    Colours of Kerala - 8 Nights / 9 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Cochin

    • Arrive in Cochin and transfer to your hotel.
    • Explore Fort Kochi, Mattancherry Palace, and admire the Chinese fishing nets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cochin.

    Day 2: Cochin to Munnar

    • Drive to Munnar, stopping at waterfalls and scenic spots along the way.
    • Check in and relax in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 3: Munnar Sightseeing

    • Visit Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty Dam, and the Tea Museum.
    • Enjoy scenic views from Echo Point and Kundala Lake.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 4: Munnar to Thekkady

    • Drive to Thekkady and check in at the hotel.
    • Take a boat ride on Periyar Lake for a chance to see wildlife.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Thekkady.

    Day 5: Thekkady to Alleppey

    • Drive to Alleppey and board a houseboat to cruise the backwaters.
    • Enjoy traditional Kerala meals and beautiful landscapes.
    • Overnight stay on a houseboat in Alleppey.

    Day 6: Alleppey to Kovalam

    • Drive to Kovalam, famous for its beaches.
    • Relax by the beach or explore local markets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kovalam.

    Day 7: Kovalam to Varkala

    • Drive to Varkala, known for its stunning cliffs and beaches.
    • Explore Varkala Beach, cliffside cafes, and local markets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Varkala.

    Day 8: Varkala to Trivandrum

    • Drive to Trivandrum, the capital of Kerala.
    • Visit Padmanabhaswamy Temple, Napier Museum, and Kuthiramalika Palace.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Trivandrum.

    Day 9: Departure from Trivandrum

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel.
    • Transfer to Trivandrum Airport or railway station for departure.
    • End of the Colours of Kerala tour.
